original_text: But if the thing is true, that evidence of virginity was not found in the young woman,
korean_text: 그 일이 참되어 그 처녀에게 처녀의 표적이 없거든

sentences.original_text: But if the thing is true,
that evidence of virginity was not found in the young woman,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 소녀에게서 처녀임의 증거를 찾지 못하였다는 것,
